content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Dear Yi-Nuo Wang, as landlord Peter Schmidt in Germany, I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. To start our negotiation, I have an initial price in mind, but let's discuss it further to find a mutually agreeable amount. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
